title: West Loop 1BR/1BA
posting_body: Desirable West Loop 1BR/1BA, 800 sq ft, with 10 ft ceilings and amazing natural light.
Beautiful kitchen opens up onto huge balcony.
Exposed concrete elements in spacious open living spaces with oak hardwood floors.
Granite breakfast bar, laundry room with washer and dryer in the unit.
Highly desired #111 S. Morgan building includes 24 hr doorman and onsite dry cleaners.
Easy access to Morgan St. Green Line station, Halsted Blue line station,  Interstates 290, 90/94, UIC and Rush medical centers, Randolph St. restaurant district.
Walk to Bartelme and Skinner Park, Brooklyn Boulders, CTA, Metra, the Loop, Target, Marianos, Whole Foods and more!
Please email or text me for more info!
